text: Multiple myeloma is a type of cancer involving the plasma cells. Some symptoms of the multiple myeloma are bone pain, kidney failure, recurring infections and anemia. It is treated with chemotherapy. A commonly used chemotherapy regimen is the vincristine, adriamycin, and dexamethasone. thalidomides, velcades, melphalans, prednisones and interferons have also been used. Category:Cancer Category:Blood disorders
title: Multiple myeloma
